Name: the roguetech pirate organization
Description: The unsettled and abandoned systems of the Rimward Frontier are a haven for piratesâ€”both in-system predators and renegade JumpShip captains who transport pirate DropShips from one system to another, taking a cut of any illicit profits.
ReputationStatements: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, you and your company, {COMPANY.CompanyName}, have been nothing but a thorn in me side, botching every mission with incompetence and folly that sets me teeth on edge.

I must begrudgingly acknowledge, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, that you and {COMPANY.CompanyName} have shown some improvement. Though your early endeavors were lacking, you've managed to salvage a few missions with acceptable results, yet still falling short of the standards befitting a true pirate crew.

Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, your tactical acumen and the prowess of {COMPANY.CompanyName} have begun to earn my grudging respect. Successfully infiltrating enemy installations and securing valuable resources speak volumes of your growing capabilities.

By the stars, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, you and {COMPANY.CompanyName} have become indispensable to our cause. Your daring raids on military outposts and extraction of critical intelligence display a level of skill and precision that I had not anticipated.

Ahoy, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! Raise a flag for you and {COMPANY.CompanyName}, for your feats have exceeded all expectations. Your audacious strikes and cunning maneuvers have instilled fear in our enemies' hearts, solidifying our dominance among the stars.

Avast, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! your audacity and skill continue to impress, striking fear into even the most formidable adversaries. Together, we forge an indomitable alliance, carving our path to victory among the stars.

Ah, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, my esteemed friend and ally in this cosmic conquest! Your bravery and ingenuity have propelled us to triumph after triumph. Together, we shall reign supreme over the galaxy, a testament to your leadership and prowess.
MissionSuccessStatements: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, I commend you and {COMPANY.CompanyName} for a resounding success in our latest mission. Your strategic brilliance and unwavering resolve have led us to victory once again. The spoils of our conquest are ours to savor, a testament to your exceptional leadership and the prowess of your mercenaries.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Though the winds did not favor us this time, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, I trust in your loyalty and the resolve of {COMPANY.CompanyName}. Even the most seasoned mercenaries face setbacks, but your efforts were commendable. Let this failure fuel our determination to seize victory in the battles to come.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, your incompetence has cost us dearly in our latest venture. Your crew's performance leaves much to be desired, and {COMPANY.CompanyName} has proven themselves nothing more than a band of scallywags. Shape up, or find yourselves on the wrong end of an autocannon.
